title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 323.2 - Commencement of contributions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 323.2 - Commencement of contributions

State Regulations

Since few payrolls begin on January 1, 1977, the effective
date of article 14, the commencement of contributions as of that date would
present an obstacle to the implementation of the coordinated-escalator
retirement plan. Therefore, the contributions required by section 517 shall be
deducted beginning with the first full payroll period in 1977 with respect to
which payment is made in 1977. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
323.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
